prompt_text: Soft editorial illustration showing a small gecko surrounded by its food items: crickets, mealworms, fruit puree dish, and a calcium powder jar. Friendly warm tone, matte texture, natural daylight. The gecko looks curious but calm. Clean beige background, subtle shadows, Geckio color palette (sand beige, moss green, muted turquoise, earth brown).

Gentle, informative illustration of a gecko being examined with care â€” a small hand holding the gecko while a magnifying glass highlights its tail or eyes. Subtle health symbolism like a green cross in the background pattern. Warm beige and muted turquoise tones, soft lighting, editorial matte texture.

Editorial illustration of a beginner gecko setup: small terrarium with plants, branches, water bowl, and a cheerful gecko inside. Soft daylight coming through, warm moss-green and sand-beige tones. Playful but instructional, balanced composition, minimal background.

Calm, detailed illustration of two geckos interacting gently on a branch, with a few small eggs in a nesting box nearby. Background soft and minimal. Earth-brown and muted turquoise tones, natural daylight, mature but approachable tone.

Symbolic illustration of a gecko perched on a balanced scale of justice. One side shows a leaf, the other a document or stamp icon. Clean minimalist background with warm beige and muted turquoise tones. Professional but friendly, simple vector style.

Detailed yet friendly illustration showing a hand arranging plants and a hiding rock in a gecko terrarium. The gecko watches nearby. Balanced layout with visible elements like thermometer, lamp, and foliage. Earthy and natural color tones, matte finish, diffused daylight.

Soft and friendly editorial illustration representing general gecko care: a small gecko resting on a leaf surrounded by warm light and natural elements (branch, foliage, soft shapes). Warm beige and moss-green tones, clean layout, matte clay texture.
